product.title: Instyler Tulip Auto Curler Automatic Curling Tong Iron Wave Machine
product.description:
The Tulip auto curler's innovative automatic curling technology lets you achieve perfect curls and waves every time without tangling or damaging hair. Curling your hair has never been so fast and easy with the simple tap of a button, you can have beachy waves in just 3 seconds, soft curls in 8 seconds and striking tight curls in 12 seconds. With the unique open barrel design of the Tulip, your hair is visible and exposed at all times, preventing hair from getting tangled and becoming jammed in the unit. The open design and ample space surrounding the barrel also makes it easy for the Tulip to curl long and thick hair. The lightweight ergonomic design of the Tulip makes curling your hair easy and comfortable. Throughout the entire styling process, the Tulip is held in a natural vertical position with a relaxed grip, putting no strain or stress on your hand or wrist.





Open ceramic barrel designed with anti-tangle technology





2-way rotation with 3 rotation settings to curl left, curl right or alternate





3 heat settings range from 350 to 430 degrees Fahrenheit to accommodate all hair types





3 timer settings to achieve a variety of looks from beachy waves to tight striking curls





Safety guard for burn-free styling

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
